item.title: Fate/hollow ataraxia REMASTERED launches August 7
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Switch

Relive the four days of destiny...

Fate/hollow ataraxia REMASTERED will launch for Switch and PC via Steam on August 7 for 3,500 yen, publisher Aniplex and developer TYPE-MOON announced. It will support English, Japanese, and Simplified Chinese language options.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Set half a year after the end of the Fifth Holy Grail War, the classic visual novel Fate/hollow ataraxia comes remastered to modern hardware. Building on the 2014 release, this remaster features English and Simplified Chinese localizations for the first time, in addition to full high-definition visuals.

Choose your own adventure in colorful scenarios unfolding day and night in the city of Fuyuki as you delve into hidden truths behind the Holy Grail War. You will also unlock a collection of feature-packed minigames as you progress through the story.

Spend your days with familiar characters and explore the world of Fate, all while fighting to survive a new Holy Grail War.

Story

Half a year has passed since Shirou Emiya won the Fifth Holy Grail War. In the wake of the conflict, Shirou and his friends are readjusting to peaceful, everyday life. Meanwhile, in a desolate mansion on the outskirts of Fuyuki, a mage awakens: Bazett Fraga McRemitz, Seal Designation Enforcer from the Mage’s Association… and former Master in the Holy Grail War.

“Come on, let’s continue the Holy Grail War, Bazett Fraga McRemitz. All so we can find your wish this time,” a shadow sneers at her. Its name is Avenger, Servant of an eighth class who never existed in the Fifth Holy Grail War. Their unlikely encounter signals that the battle is far from finished.

Shirou Emiya, aspiring champion of justice, steps onto the stage of the Holy Grail War once more. What fate awaits him beyond these four days of destiny?

Minigames Included

  • Jump! Tiger & Shorts Hanafuda Travel Journal EX (Excellion)
  • Rise! Operation Super Space-Time Tiger & Shorts Hanafuda
  • Jump! Super Space-Time Tiger & Shorts Hanafuda Travel Journal EX (Excellion)
  • Tempest Illya’s Castle ~Assault! Einzbern~
  • Better Fortune Tohsaka Shrine

*Capsule Servant is not included in this release.

Watch a new set of trailers below.

Release Date Trailer

English

Japanese

Minigames Trailer

English

Japanese



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/fate-hollow-ataraxia-remastered-launches-august-7

item.title: Lost Soul Aside ‘Weapons’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5

Sword, Greatsword, Poleblade, and Scythe.

Publisher Sony Interactive Entertainment and developer Ultizero Games have released a new trailer for action RPG Lost Soul Aside introducing the game’s various weapons.

Weapons introduced in the trailer include:

  • Sword – Split-second strikes
  • Greatsword – Earth-shattering power
  • Poleblade – Piercing storm
  • Scythe – Cutting-edge control

The trailer description reads, “In Lost Soul Aside, you have total freedom to fight your way; switching weapons, mixing attack patterns and learning your enemy’s movements in adrenaline-pumping battles charged with spectacular visual effects.”

Lost Soul Aside is due out for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on August 29.

Watch the trailer below.

Weapons Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/lost-soul-aside-weapons-trailer

item.title: Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact teases DLC characters Phinks Magcub, Shizuku Murasaki, and Zeno Zoldyck
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch

Season Pass 1 begins with Neferpitou this fall.

Publishers Bushiroad Games and Arc System Works, and developer Eighting have released the Season Pass 1 trailer for fighting game Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact, which teases Phinks Magcub, Shizuku Murasaki, and Zeno Zoldyck in addition to the previously announced Neferpitou.

While the three characters were not officially announced, the silhouettes that appear in the trailer are an exact match to each character’s appearance in the Hunter x Hunter anime.

The release window for each character is as follows:

  • Fall 2025 – Neferpitou
  • Winter 2025 – Phinks Magcub
  • Spring 2026 – Shizuku Murasaki
  • Summer 2026 – Zeno Zoldyck

Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact is available now for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC via Steam.

Watch the trailer below.

Season Pass 1 Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/hunter-x-hunter-nen-x-impact-teases-dlc-characters-phinks-magcub-shizuku-murasaki-and-zeno-zoldyck

item.title: Netcode Warriors – EVO 2025 trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Latest look at the anime-inspired arena fighting game.

Son Studios has released the EVO 2025 trailer for Netcode Warriors, its upcoming anime-inspired arena fighting game featuring character designs by Digimon illustrators Kenji Watanabe and Soh Morimiya.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

⁤Dive into the datascape of Netcode Warriors, an anime-style arena fighter designed from the ground up to take competitive play to its limits. Engage in intense one-on-one fights, master unique characters and playstyles, then take your skills to the arena. ⁤

Story

Immerse yourself in the story of Netcode Warriors, where our characters discover a new world that has the potential to change their lives, but they’re not the only ones around, and they’ll have to fight to achieve their dreams and survive.

Online Play

Take your skills online and prove YOU are the best! Play the game in various online modes climb the ranks and assert your skill, play casual matches with people from all over the world, and invite your friends to play with custom lobbies that include a spectator mode.

Other Modes

Hone your skills in training mode, run through the arcade ladder or play split screen with a friend locally. You can also throw down the gauntlet in the local tournament mode, battle for survival and do some combo challenges.

Netcode Warriors will be available for PC via Steam. A release date has yet to be announced.

Watch the trailer below.

EVO 2025 Extended Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/netcode-warriors-evo-2025-trailer

item.title: Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising DLC character Wilnas release date to be announced on August 2
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5

EX characters playable at EVO 2025.

The release date for Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising Character Pass Season 2 downloadable content character Wilnas will be announced after the gam’s EVO 2025 finals on August 2, publisher Cygames and developer Arc System Works announced.

Here are the latest details, via Cygames:

Wilnas (voiced by Xander Mobus in English, Masaaki Mizunaka in Japanese)

Instead of dash attacks and triple attacks, Wilnas commands a variety of advancing skills to navigate in battle. He also excels from a distance, leveraging his exceptional reach to dominate the battlefield with devastating blows and pummel his foes with overwhelming force.

Maneuvering Wilnas

Believe in Hadron Smash! (Neutral + Skill)

Charge in with Volcanic Knee! (4 + Skill)

Height

Height: 210cm.

Weapon Skins

EX Characters

Playable at the Cygames [EVO 2025] booth! Press R1 while selecting Gran, Djeeta, or Narmaya on the character select screen.

New Costumes Coming Soon

Wilnas Trailer and Release Date Reveal on August 2

Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising is available now for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/granblue-fantasy-versus-rising-dlc-character-wilnas-release-date-to-be-announced-on-august-2

item.title: Rivals of Aether II adds Galvan on October 7
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Fighting game's fourth free additional character update.

Platform fighting game Rivals of Aether II will add Galvan, “The Ferrous Fossil,” as its fourth free additional character update on October 7, developer Aether Studios announced.

Rivals of Aether II is available now for PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer and character showcase below.

Galvan Trailer

Galvan Showcase and Behind the Scenes
